author: tienna
title: Localize iohk.io for vietnamese
description: Strategic and technical information from IOHK website (iohk.io) needs to be conveyed to the Vietnamese community in a friendly way.

f6_assessments.q0: Vietnam is a country with more than 100 million population and a young population, interest in the cryptocurrency market is huge. However, the main language is Vietnamese. This makes it very difficult for the community to access and in-depth research on blockchain and platforms like Cardano. Localize iohk.io for Vietnamese is a great proposal to help the crypto community in Vietnam learn more about the Cardano platform. Through articles from iohk.io, the community can fully and accurately update the news and knowledge from Cardano. This helps Cardano grow even more in this country of over 100 million people.
f6_assessments.q1: The team consists of many members with experience and in-depth knowledge of the Cardano ecosystem such as Nguyen Anh Tien, Quoc Nguyen, etc. I believe that with their capacity and enthusiasm, this proposal will be implemented by them. successful. However, I also want to advise you that you need to add solutions of some of the risks that make this proposal unsuccessful. For example, it is difficult to find translators because translators also need certain expertise and experience in the blockchain field. The volatility from ADA is very large, this will affect the budget, so you need a solution for this.
f6_assessments.q2: You have given a very detailed and complete roadmap for 5 months to implement the proposal. The goal is also very clear. I believe that you will also complete well and on time the goals you have set. In addition, with a budget of $21,331, you are also using it very reasonably and transparently. I greatly appreciate this. In addition to the KPI information you give, I think you also need to specify the numerical goals that will be achieved in terms of the number of new people accessing iohk.io. This is also very important. I believe that, if this information is fully available, the community will appreciate it more

f6_assessments.q0: I strongly support this project. Language barrier is hindering non-English speaking people reaching to Cardano latest news and update and this idea will surely help. Automatic translation tools have improved a lot but still far from perfect esspcially in technical domains. In Vietnam, many young people are interested in crypto currency and blockchain but mainly on Bitcoin and Ethereum. This project will attract more users and investers attention to Cardano ecosystem
f6_assessments.q1: Proposal lasts for 5 months with concrete tasks and outputs. The cost estimation is comprehensive and reasonable. Team members are Cardano CA and coordinators who have English language proficiency and knowledge about Cardano blockchain and ecosystem. I don's see any major risks that cause the project fail
f6_assessments.q2: The project task and goals are straightforward to understand and evaluate. The project is scheduled to execute within 5 months with 5 phases so the output of each phase can be checked and evaluated by Cardano challenge team in monthly report.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal addresses the translation of strategic and technical information from the IOHK.IO website. It helps the community in Vietnam understand what the IOHK team has been working on and future directions. The IOHK.IO website is available in English and Chinese. Most Vietnamese will read the english and chinese newsletter through google's automatic translation tool. Through practice, the proposal team finds that these translations are not accurate, especially technical articles. It causes readers in the vietnamese community to misunderstand the posted information. Adding vietnamese to the website will support people in the vietnamese community accurately understand the information posted on the IOHK.IO website. The content translated into vietnamese by the proposal team will also be shared on social media to introduce to the vietnamese community. This proposal really has the potential for the Vietnamese community to capture more accurate and effective IOHK information. This proposal fully meets the requirements set forth for the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal team members are people who have full knowledge and experience to carry out this proposal. Their published products show the high feasibility of this proposal. The plan of this proposal is very clear descripted and detailed, expressing details of a five-month activity (such as establishing a translation team, connect with IOHK and sign a cooperation agreement, coordinate with IOHK to evaluate the quality of sample translation, complete the translation into Vietnamese, share translated, run marketing program). The budget and goals are obviously descripted, with a complete, aesthetic timeline. The funds will be spent for 4 targets: translation wage, project manager salary Marketing and Community salary and contingency costs for more translations. I strongly agree that this proposal will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is providing a list within an expected timeframe. Checkpoints are set up in the in the first month, second month, fourth month and fifth month. Based on a well-described roadmap and KPI, I can see the goal of the proposal and the method of implementation is clear. There are indicators related to number of complete translated articles, number of shared articles, and number of local popular communities (Cardano ADA Việt Nam). The proposal team aims to translate information from IOHK website and share the fruits of their labour with the community via the website (cardano2vn.io), Telegram/Facebook communities. I strongly agree that this proposal provides me with sufficient information to measure the progress in attaining its stated goals.

f6_assessments.q0: According to the Global Cryptocurrency Acceptance Index (GCAI) data released by Chainalysis in 2021, Vietnam ranks first in the crypto adoption index. Proposal to solve the problem of transmitting strategic and technical information about the Cardano ecosystem from IOHK to the community in Vietnam, where the language barrier is slowing or preventing information from reaching members enthusiasm of the Cardano ecosystem here. The proposal is described in a concise and easy-to-understand manner; it fits. If implemented, this proposal will have a great impact on the community in Vietnam because it provides information that has been censored by IOHK itself, thereby helping the Vietnamese community to understand the content and information clearly. The message IOHK wants to convey and help build trust in Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1:
The members of the proposed team are people who have participated in the Cardano community, have studied Cardano and the ecosystem; They have passion, enthusiasm to share experiences and inspire about Cardano for the Vietnamese community.
For this proposal, information quality and timeliness are the most important. The proposal has clearly defined objectives, challenges, and problems to be solved, and an appropriate and clear step-by-step implementation plan according to each specific timeline. The team also provides a clear, concise budget where all the costs needed to carry out the project have been outlined to ensure the project is successfully implemented.
To me, this proposal is feasible, but it would be more complete and convincing if the proposed team would describe more clearly how to communicate and how to attract users to visit the iohk.io page to read information by Vietnamese.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a KPI described with specific metrics and goals to be achieved over time, milestones that can be tracked every month. Project development metrics are clearly described, easy-to-understand, and provide verifiable measures of success by the community. I fully agree that this proposal provides me with sufficient information to gauge progress in achieving the set goals.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is suitable fo the challenge. According to the ranking of EPI in 2021 (http://www.ef.com/epi), Vietnam ranks 66/112 countries and regions in the world in terms of usage English, so English is a huge barrier for Vietnamese people compared to the world. The proposal is a radical and effective way to solve the problem of language barriers and limited understanding of strategic and technical information from the IOHK.IO website to the Vietnamese cardano community. By adding Vietnamese language, users will correctly understand blockchain/cardano information, giving users more confidence, and attracting more and more new people who are interested in the cardano community. for the community to develop more and more sustainably.
f6_assessments.q1: with the experience and plan presented above, it is certain that the proposal will be implemented successfully. The proposed team has provided sufficient evidence and information about the team members, who are talented and quite famous in the Vietnamese cardano community, that is, Ms. Mie Tran, Mr Quoc Nguyen... The team also pointed out that the risk is the quality of the translation and updating the news on time, and they came up with a very smart treatment plan, after the translation is complete, it will be cross-checked and consulted with IOHK. , an agreement with IOHK for early disclosure of the news to the executive team prior to its release on the Web. The number of members and the organizational structure including the advisory board, reviewers and translators along with the connection to IOHK is reasonable. Budgets and timetables for getting the job done are fully understandable.
f6_assessments.q2: Based on the information provided, it is enough to audit the process, with the plan and the list of KPI in place, it is possible to objectively measure the proposal and accurately. he proponent made it clear from the start that this is a project that supports the development of the Vietnamese community in a sustainable way. Readers can read information from IOHK.IO Web site in their mother tongue, which increases understanding, trust and transparency for the community. This is a sign that the proponent is very close to and understands the community, and then they seek and act to help the community develop more broadly and sustainably.

f6_assessments.q0:
The Cardano community is growing stronger in Vietnam, so it needs official strategy and technical information from Cardano. The IOHK.IO Web site is the official website, giving information about what IOHK is doing and its future direction.
However, the language barrier is limiting the Vietnamese community's access to information. Currently, the google translate tool is quite good, but the accuracy is not as high as expected, especially for technical articles. This affects the community's understanding and access to information about Cardano.
Therefore, the solution of this project is to cooperate with IOHK to add Vietnamese language to the IOHK.IO Website. After being checked and approved, the translated articles are also shared on major media channels in Vietnam such as telegram, Facebook...
Accurate information from IOHK will help the Cardano VN community grow strong and sustainably, thereby developing the Cardano ecosystem. Thus, the goal of the project is consistent with the goal of the challenge. 
The proposal presented two risks: The first was to control the quality of the translations. For this, the team came up with a solution of cross-checking and in the lower part, the translation team includes both an advisory board and a moderator. The second is the timely update of news, the proposed team has an agreement solution with IOHK on early disclosure of the news before it is released on the Web. Thus, the solution proposed by the team is feasible.
f6_assessments.q1:
The project has a monthly roadmap from the first to the fifth month, each month has specific tasks to be completed, for example, the first month: Establishing a translation team, connecting with IOHK and signing an agreement cooperate and coordinate with IOHK to evaluate the quality of sample translations; the 2nd month: Complete Vietnamese translations for these website functions, translate all blog posts by 2022 (until end of 3/2022) …
This roadmap is quite clear on the work to be done according to specific timelines so the project can be done well.
f6_assessments.q2:
The total cost for the project is $21,331, including translation costs $13,501, project management costs $3,600, marketing and community costs $2,880, and contingency costs $1,350. The proposed team only calculates the translation cost, it is not clear whether the cost of checking the quality of the translations is included, although on the part of the translation team's work, there is a job to check the quality of the translation. 
The proposed translation salary is $19/page, project management $50/hour, marketing and community costs $40/hour. This cost level proposed by the team does not explain the basis, but I estimate that 1 page is about 500 words, and the normal translation unit price is 0.04 USD/word, so the above translation cost is reasonable.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is suitable for the challenge as it will convey strategic and technical information from the IOHK website (iohk.io) to the Vietnamese community in a friendly manner by cooperating with IOHK to add the Vietnamese language go to the iohk.io website. Thereby helping the Cardano Vietnamese community to develop sustainably, in an inclusive and supportive manner. Proposals are well organized, specific objectives are clear.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal implementation team has 7 members they are have knowledgeable about blockchain technology, moderators / co-hosts of Eastern Townhall, experienced in translating projects and giving back to the community. They provide evidence to prove their experience through the links. The project's development roadmap covers 5 months from May to September 2022. and have plan to extend the proposal for 2023 from September 2022 by submitting an additional proposal for translation and promotion all articles by 2023. The total budget requested for this project is $21331 split across the translation salary, project management, community marketing, and contingency costs. The amount is calculated specifically to each translated a4 page, each working hour. The proposer has also foreseen the risks and made contingency plans to deal with them. In summary I strongly believe this proposal can be successfully implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has provided a project implementation roadmap with defined timelines from May-September 2022. The metrics to measure project success are also very clear, specific to each timeline. Readers can easily measure the project's progress against the provided goals. The only thing I wonder is that the project has a plan to execute until September 2022, so will the content released on IOHK.IO after September 2022 continues to be completed by the project. If the proposer can make this clear, the project will be perfect.

f6_assessments.q0:
Love the idea, but I'm not sure this fits the challenge, as Vietnam (Southeast Asia) is not one of the East Asian countries (according to Wikipedia, East Asia includes China, Japan, Mongolia, North Korea, South Korea, and Taiwan). And there is other 
 CHALLENGES more in line with their projects, for this reason, I specially read the purpose of this CHALLENGE, it is hoped to target East Asian countries and their members, as a member of East Asia, I can fully understand the intention of this CHALLENGE, plus CARDANO was started in Japan and Hong Kong in East Asia. Therefore, want to provide this resource for East Asian countries to encourage them to participate, after all, very few East Asian people participate in CATALYST, so there is a great need for the existence of this CHALLENGE, the number of Southeast Asian participants in CARDANO is actually a lot  and mostly of them are already very active in the Community, so I think we should abide by the purpose and spirit of this CHALLENGE, try to Encourage members mainly from East Asian countries to join as the first priority.
f6_assessments.q1: The feasibility of a project is related to the relevance of CHALLENGE and the success afterwards. (Grow East Asia, EA includes China, Japan, Mongolia, North Korea, South Korea, and Taiwan) If we want to see whether the project will be successful or not, we have to see whether we can achieve the effect or the real impact that CHALLENGE is expected to achieve. If the porject is based in one of the EA countries, I will definetly support it.
f6_assessments.q2: The above criterias must be met before the project can be auditable, so if the project is in an EA country, then it meets this CHALLENGE and therefore auditable

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal identifies the fact that strategic and technical information from the IOHK.IO website is important to the Cardano Community but not many Vietnamese can access this useful information due to language barrier. The writer proposes to cooperate with IOHK to add the Vietnamese language for iohk.io website (blog sections, news....). Whenever there is new content, they will translate it into Vietnamese and share it with IOHK to post on the website. Having accurate directional information from IOHK will help the Vietnamese community develop sustainably, in an inclusive and supportive way. Substantively, the Cardano team will develop more strongly and effectively in Vietnam. This Proposal can be widened time after time when more and more experienced Cardano members know the project and join in, the Cardano brand will be more popular and therefore we have many new members in the team. As for me, the writer should give out some metrics to measure the success, such as the number of member before and after running the project, the interactive of Vietnamese on Cardano community before and after running the project.
f6_assessments.q1: The people joining in the team have experiences in managing, translating, Cardano information. They are surely appropriate with the translation of Cardano information for the community in Vietnam. This proposal aims to Vietnamese Cardano community, helping them to access useful knowledge from website iohk.io by translating documents from the web. Budget is drafted logically and clearly. It is divided into identified items, including the cost for translation wage, project manager and community salary, marketing, contingency. The schedule is planned in 5 months, including step by step targets from signing contract, evaluating the translation draft, establishing a translation team, translating all blog posts in 2022, sharing articles on the website cardano2vn.io., completing the translations in the blog section of 2021 and then in 2022, continuing to run marketing program to announce Vietnamese language option of iohk.io website on local telegram/Facebook communities. The proposed team includes 7 persons handling different areas in the translation team. They admit that all translation document will be cross-checked and consult IOHK when there is a need for clarification. However, they should clarify some main challenges they may face when implementing the project such as who can guaranty the translation quality, how the team control the translation quality, the limited time for completing one translation version. They should also mention the solutions to these problems.
f6_assessments.q2: The project is expected to last in 5 months for trial, having clear target for each month. The proposers show the number of article translation to be completed after each month, particularly: 2 evaluations of the translation drafts for first month, 12 article translation for 2nd months, 178 articles in 3rd and 4th month. It is estimated that by the end of 2022, there will be 710 A4 pages of content translated into Vietnamese. This Proposal is described clearly and the problem solution method is easy to understand.

f6_assessments.q0: Proposing to meet the challenge goal By translating the content on the Cardano ecosystem's iohk.io page into the Vietnamese language. That helps the official and important content of the Cardano ecosystem to reach the Vietnamese correctly. Vietnam is a country with great development potential in East Asia in terms of Information Technology and Cryptocurrency applications (It's great that this information comes with a link to prove it). Having accurate directional information from IOHK will help the Vietnamese community develop sustainably in an inclusive and supportive manner. Proposal to add value to the Cardano ecosystem. Because the translation will help the Vietnamese Community understand the content as well as the message IOHK wants to convey. This helps to build trust in Cardano. The increase in value is demonstrated by the team committed to increasing the percentage of traffic to the iohk.io website from 3.36% to 5% in 3 months. According to the proposal presented in the roadmap, upon completion of this proposal they will continue to submit an additional proposal for the translation and promotion of all articles by 2023. This demonstrates the proposal has a plan scale to address future challenges. I like the idea and hope the proposal gets funded and implemented.
f6_assessments.q1: The road map provides a timetable divided by each main phase of the project. Each stage has detailed tasks to accomplish the set goals. The plan presented that I can clearly understand each task and how to complete the project. The presented budget breakdown is excellent. The budget figures are very detailed and transparent calculations. The author uses the number of translated pages to determine the Budget. The community can check the number of translated pages on the existing iohk.io website. Based on that data, the team has classified the Budget, including management salary, translation salary, salary for marketing and community, and 10% contingency. The Proposal calculated salary according to the working hours of each specific job and the hours are entirely reasonable, it is not too high. I can clearly understand how every $ is spent and its reason. I have read through many projects, but few budgets are as clear and specific as this Proposal. The team has a lot of experience and knowledge to meet the proposed task. The team is quite large, consisting of 7 people; each person is fully presented with expertise and has public information such as email, telegram, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook. It would be nice if the Proposal provided more details about the specific task of members in the project. However, the transparency and experience of the team, the detailed and clear Roadmap, and the cost sheet make me feel confident that the proposer will implement the Proposal successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: I appreciate the proposed audit tool. Each stage and task has clear KPIs and timelines. KPIs include the number of articles translated, posted notices, increased traffic rate, which the Community can check on iohk.io, Similarweb, cardano2vn.io, and local communities. The project's success shows that the KPIs are completed, percentage of traffic from Vietnam to iohk.io is increased by 5% (Verified via sameweb.com). In my opinion, the rate of traffic is an essential indicator through which it can evaluate the impact of the project on the Vietnamese Community. It shows the success or failure of the project. The proposal based on this percentage shows the team's commitment to the project implementation. I was impressed with the project's audit. All indicators can be verified using reputable tools. As a result, the project shows clarity and transparency.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposer identified the problem in detail and offer a solution to translate the iohk.io key contents into Vietnamese and using a google translation or other machinery auto-translation most of the time will not cover the technical aspect correctly to bridge the language barrier. The proposer clearly describe how it will benefit the local Vietnamese community, and shares why Vietnam is important for Crypto adoption.

The only clear challenge is the approval from IOHK itself about this proposal to approve the content published on their website, but if it succeeds other countries can follow this lead too, by using similar methodology / system - which is good for the community as a whole
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer shares a very detailed timeline to implement this project successfully with a detailed reference to their experienced team and resources needed - including the supporting data to back up their proposal. With a total of 5-6 months timeframe, it seems reasonable to implement this proposal successfully.

The budget was broken down in detail and the costs are reasonable, but a bit higher on the total budget (above 10% of the total challenge budget) - this may be caused by the number of articles they want to produce within this funding. A contingency budget is also included in the proposal to mitigate common risk.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer defines a clear target of how this project can be measured to achieve its success. The KPI is stated in numbers that will be easy to understand and track by the community. I would suggest creating a GitHub page for project progress and a Cardano Forum thread to publish the results.

f6_assessments.q0:
As a Vietnamese, I like the idea of ​​this proposal, as a lot of Vietnamese are interested in information about Cardano but don't know where to find the official source, as well as the language difference will make it difficult in approaching Cardano, especially when it comes to specs, it's hard to understand it exactly. Therefore, the proposed solution is to cooperate with IOHK to add more Vietnamese language to the iohk.io website, which in my opinion will completely solve the challenge mentioned above. If this proposal is successfully implemented, it will help the Vietnamese community understand what the IOHK team is doing and its future direction.
There are a number of proposed risks presented, but with the capacity of this team of proposals, I am confident that they can overcome the above risks with ease.
f6_assessments.q1:
The lead author of the idea has a solid background when it comes to evaluating proposals and in the crypto universe, as we can see from the information he attached, from what I understand of the analysis. proposed volume. In addition, he also attached affiliate links such as Linkedin, facebook, telegram... of group members, helping the community easily approach the group and trust in the group's ability to implement recommendations. It is easy to track project progress as the proposal provides a detailed plan that includes timelines tied to specific goals. The budget allocated in the proposed $21,331 (approximately 14% of the total challenge budget) is realistic to achieve the clearly stated and set goal. The costs have been stated very specifically and in detail, allocated straight to the problem, very transparent, making it easy for the community to check what the requested amount is used for.
I strongly believe that with the experience and planning presented here, it is very likely that this proposal will be successfully implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: A clear roadmap with milestones over a 5-month period is provided. Both a section with easy-to-follow KPIs along with a short list of future plans beyond the initial 3-month deadline will increase the transparency of this project and proposal. The goals and measures of success are very specific. This group emphasizes the importance of transparency of projects by posting documents on social networks such as Facebook, telegram... in this way it is also easier to connect the community more closely. Key figures and facts were presented and the budget requested was compatible with what they provided. For the reasons above, I agree that this recommendation provides me with sufficient information to measure progress in achieving the stated goals.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea is great, it is about to translate IOHK website into Vietnamese by co-operating with IOHK. In other words, when a Vietnamese person click into the website iohk.io, he/she can choose Vietnamese language to read and understand all the contents in an easy and convenient way, without the struggle with translation as before. This idea, which seems to be simple at first, will bring a big impact on Vietnamese community, because once it is success, it will help not only Vietnamese people who want to know about Cardano ecosystem but also Vietnamese people who are Cardano participants but do not have chance to update fully information about Cardano due to the language barrier , now be able to understand and catch up strategy and technical information from IOHK, steer them in the right direction to take advantages of Cardano community’s support and build on or use Cardano network in an inclusive and supportive way. I believe we will have more proposals originating from Vietnamese participants in Project Catalyst, more quantity and quality of funded proposals originating from Vietnamese teams, and more meaningful participation from Vietnam in Cardano community from here. Therefore, the proposal totally fits the challenge and will add value to the Cardano system.
f6_assessments.q1:
Certainly the proposal has a good team because of the presented and described in details about what their areas of expertise are, as well as their previous experiences, detail of projects they have already done, how long they have been in the areas with evidence provided. We also see more information about each of members involved through their linkedin profiles, where we can contact them to know them better. 
About the financial amount, I think it is split quite fair and reasonable as we can see how the money asked would be use.
The detailed plan is given in a clear and succint way what is being done in each of months in a period of 5 months, however I do not see 3rd month (Maybe just a typing mistake or I miss something here?). They also foresee the challenges/risks that they have to face when conducting the proposal as well as the solution given to solve the problem. The well-prepared plan and the description budget give us a vision of the project as a whole. Therefore, I give the feasibility with a score of 5.
f6_assessments.q2:
I see this part of the project is very complete, we have more than enough material to understand what would happen, how it would happen, in which order and vision, which final products: The team describe in detail what success look like, giving us the necessary content to establish tracking. We can audit the proposal based on the information provided in the detailed plan. About the results, it is possible to monitor them through the KPIs or through the section "What does success for this project look like? ". Regard to the detailed plan, we can see translated articles on the website cardano2vn.io from 2nd month after the proposal is funded, moreover we can monitor the products in the iohk website.
Therefore, I strongly agree the proposal is auditable.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal has great significance for the Vietnamese community in particular and the Cardano ecosystem in general. It effectively tackles the challenge. This proposal cooperates with IOHK to add the Vietnamese language for iohk.io website (blog sections, news....). Whenever there is new content, it will be translated into Vietnamese and share it with IOHK to post on the website. Having accurate directional information from IOHK will help the Vietnamese community develop sustainably, in an inclusive and supportive way.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team consists of many members, their knowledge, skills and experience are also mentioned. They have achieved many successes, such as: many members are Eastern Townhall co-hosts, have a lot of experience in the blockchain field, participate in many platform projects on Cardano,... Team Information transparent team thanks to contacts (telegram, linkedin,...). With the above team, this project is completely possible.
The roadmap for each month is defined specifically, the criteria for evaluating success are also described (by the end of 2022, there will be 710 A4 pages of content translated into Vietnamese,. ..). This helps people get an overview of what you're going to do, so it's easier for them to make comments and reviews. The budget is allocated quite reasonably, mainly to pay for the translation. Clearly defining the number of working hours and the hourly wage also contributes to the transparency of the budget.
f6_assessments.q2: Based on all the information you provide, this project is completely possible. Providing strategic information in native languages will raise the awareness levels of regular people in the Vietnam community about blockchain, thereby promoting participation from the community. many people will become proposers, CA, vCA, SPO, referer, Voter when they have access to this valuable information. If this project is funded, I hope in the future, you will translate into more languages: Japanese, Korean,... I will vote for you, thanks for an interesting proposal.

solution: Co-operate with IOHK to add Vietnamese language to the iohk.io website.
experience: Our team with relevant experiences in translating projects, DevOps, blockchain tech-savvies, SPO, Eastern Townhall moderators/co-hosts.
